function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collection of governmental data including health records poses a risk of privacy breaches and data misuse.","Impact":"Unauthorized access to health records can lead to identity theft, fraud, and discrimination.","Mitigation":"Strict access controls, encryption, and anonymization of personal data.","Technologies":"Blockchain, encryption technologies, data anonymization tools.","People":"Citizens, patients, and individuals with personal health information.","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations, and data privacy regulators."},{"Description":"Integration of personal private data sources raises the risk of data exposure and unauthorized use.","Impact":"Data breaches can lead to privacy violations, identity theft, and reputational damage.","Mitigation":"Data encryption, secure transfer protocols, and user consent management.","Technologies":"End-to-end encryption, secure data transfer protocols, consent management platforms.","People":"Individuals using mobile, wearable devices, and social media platforms.","Owner":"Data privacy regulators, technology companies, and individual users."}]}
